question: Which Aztec ruler was deposed by Cortez?
api_result: The Aztec ruler who was deposed by Hernán Cortés was Moctezuma II (also spelled Montezuma II). Moctezuma II was the ninth tlatoani (ruler) of Tenochtitlan and reigned from 1502 until his capture by Cortés in 1519. After being taken captive, Moctezuma remained a puppet leader under Spanish control until his death in 1520, under circumstances that remain a subject of historical debate.
